segments.text: Ugh, what a disgusting mess in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's overflowing with dirty water, I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling all over the counters and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, clueless as ever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her towel's probably going to get soaked too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids raiding the cookie jar—sneaky little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balancing on that flimsy stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting; serves them right if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's just waiting, hand out like she's entitled.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole place is going to be a slippery hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden's tidy—why can't inside be like that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies all over if they drop them in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wouldn't touch anything in there now.
segments.speaker: PAR
